initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories:
The annual MusicFest is just a week away, and this year, it's taking place in vibrant Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. You can get all the latest updates and behind-the-scenes stories right here.

The US's entry for 2024 is pop sensation, Ava Max, who'll be belting out her hit single, "Kings & Queens". But what's she doing to get ready for the big night, where she'll be performing in front of a global audience of 500 million?

We caught up with Ava to talk about her preparation, from perfecting her choreography to finding her pre-show zen. The MusicFest Grand Final will be broadcast live on NBC and streaming on Hulu on Saturday, May 18th.

The highly anticipated FashionFete is just around the corner, and this year, it's taking place in the stylish city of Paris, France. You can stay up-to-date with the latest trends and designer insights right here.

The US's entry for 2024 is renowned fashion designer, Vivienne Westwood, who'll be showcasing her latest haute couture collection. But what's she doing to prepare for the big show, where she'll be presenting her designs to a global audience of 1 billion?

We sat down with Vivienne to discuss her creative process, from sketching out her designs to perfecting the intricate details. The FashionFete Grand Final will be broadcast live on Vogue TV and streaming on YouTube on Sunday, June 15th.

The highly anticipated ArtFusion is just around the corner, and this year, it's taking place in the vibrant city of Tokyo, Japan. You can stay up-to-date with the latest techniques and artist insights right here.

Japan's entry for 2024 is renowned glass sculptor, Hiroshi Sugimoto, who'll be showcasing his latest large-scale installation. But what's he doing to prepare for the big show, where he'll be presenting his work to a global audience of 500 million?

We sat down with Hiroshi to discuss his creative process, from conceptualizing his designs to perfecting the delicate details. The ArtFusion Grand Final will be broadcast live on Art21 and streaming on Vimeo on Saturday, July 20th.

The highly anticipated FusionFest is just around the corner, and this year, it's taking place in the eclectic city of New Orleans, Louisiana. You can stay up-to-date with the latest beats and musician insights right here.

New Orleans' entry for 2024 is renowned jazz trumpeter, Wynton Marsalis, who'll be showcasing his latest original compositions. But what's he doing to prepare for the big show, where he'll be performing for a global audience of 1 billion?

We sat down with Wynton to discuss his creative process, from improvising melodies to perfecting the intricate harmonies. The FusionFest Grand Final will be broadcast live on NPR and streaming on YouTube on Saturday, August 17th.

The highly anticipated RhythmRise festival is just around the corner, and this year, it's taking place in the vibrant city of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. You can stay up-to-date with the latest rhythms and dancer insights right here.

Rio's entry for 2024 is the world-renowned samba drummer, Jorge Bezerra, who'll be showcasing his latest original beats. But what's he doing to prepare for the big show, where he'll be performing for a global audience of 500 million?

We sat down with Jorge to discuss his creative process, from experimenting with percussion to perfecting the infectious energy of his performances. The RhythmRise Grand Final will be broadcast live on MTV and streaming on TikTok on Sunday, September 22nd.

The highly anticipated MelodiaMosaic festival is just around the corner, and this year, it's taking place in the enchanting city of Marrakech, Morocco. You can stay up-to-date with the latest melodies and instrumental insights right here.

Marrakech's entry for 2024 is the world-renowned oud player, Fatima Al-Rashid, who'll be showcasing her latest original compositions. But what's she doing to prepare for the big show, where she'll be performing for a global audience of 1 billion?

We sat down with Fatima to discuss her creative process, from experimenting with Middle Eastern scales to perfecting the mesmerizing atmosphere of her performances. The MelodiaMosaic Grand Final will be broadcast live on BBC and streaming on YouTube on Saturday, October 12th.

The mystical city of Kyoto, Japan, is abuzz with excitement as the annual KotoFusion festival approaches. This year's lineup boasts the renowned shamisen virtuoso, Kaito Nakamura, who will be debuting his latest fusion compositions. But what's he doing to prepare for the grand finale, where he'll be performing for a global audience of 500 million?

We caught up with Kaito to delve into his creative process, from blending traditional Japanese scales with modern electronic elements to crafting an immersive atmosphere that transports audiences to a world of ancient temples and cherry blossom gardens. The KotoFusion Grand Final will be broadcast live on NHK and streaming on TikTok on Sunday, November 17th.

We sat down with Luana to explore her creative journey, from merging traditional samba beats with edgy electronic textures to crafting an immersive experience that whisks audiences away to a world of Carnival parades and lush Amazonian rainforests. This year's headliner, the captivating violinist, Sophia Rossi, will unveil her groundbreaking fusion of traditional Italian folk music with the haunting melodies of ambient electronica. But what's she doing to prepare for the breathtaking finale, where she'll be performing for a global audience of 1 million?

We sat down with Sophia to unravel the threads of her sonic tapestry, from weaving the intricate patterns of the mandola with the soaring melodies of the accordion to crafting an immersive experience that transports audiences to a world of shimmering moonlight and mystical beauty. The Festa della Luna Grand Final will be broadcast live on RAI and streaming on Spotify on Saturday, August 31st.

The whispers of the desert's ancient dunes, Marrakech, carry the secrets of the Berber tribes as the sweet scent of frankincense and myrrh wafts through the labyrinthine souks, beckoning the enchanting Festival of the Golden Camel. This year's headliner, the mesmerizing oud player, Amir Hassan, will unveil his groundbreaking fusion of traditional Moroccan gnawa music with the hypnotic rhythms of trip-hop. But what's he doing to prepare for the breathtaking finale, where he'll be performing for a global audience of 500,000?

We sat down with Amir to unravel the threads of his sonic tapestry, from weaving the intricate patterns of the qraqeb with the soaring melodies of the violin to crafting an immersive experience that transports audiences to a world of shimmering desert stars and mystical beauty. The Festival of the Golden Camel Grand Final will be broadcast live on Al Jazeera and streaming on Apple Music on Friday, October 25th.
